definition: Ergrauend refers to the process or state of becoming gray or turning gray. It is typically used to describe the gradual graying of hair or the graying of an object or material over time.

examples.english: My hair is slowly turning gray.

examples.german: Ergrauende Wolken kündigen einen Sturm an.
examples.english: Gray clouds indicate a storm is coming.

examples.german: Seine ergrauenden Augen zeigten seine Weisheit.
examples.english: His graying eyes showed his wisdom.

examples.german: Die ergrauenden Blätter fielen im Herbst von den Bäumen.
examples.english: The graying leaves fell from the trees in autumn.

examples.german: Ergrauende Haare sind ein Zeichen des Alters.
examples.english: Graying hair is a sign of aging.
